testCases.description: Extract skills from a software engineer resume

input.message:
Extract skills from this resume text:

John Doe - Senior Software Engineer
5 years experience with Python, TypeScript, React, AWS.
Led a team of 5 engineers. Built microservices architecture.
Expert in machine learning with TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Strong communication and leadership skills.
MS Computer Science from MIT.

config.rubric: Rate how well the output extracts and categorizes skills from the resume. Check if skills are properly categorized (technical vs soft), levels are assigned, and nothing important is missed. Score 0-10.

testCases.description: Build complete profile from parsed data

input.message:
Build a complete professional profile from this information:

Name: Jane Smith
Current Role: Product Manager at Google
Previous: PM at Stripe (2019-2022), Analyst at McKinsey (2017-2019)
Education: MBA Stanford, BS Economics UC Berkeley
Skills: Product strategy, data analysis, SQL, A/B testing, agile, stakeholder management
Location: San Francisco, CA

config.rubric: Rate the completeness of the profile. Does it include name, title, summary, experience entries with dates, education, and categorized skills? Score 0-10.
